sense.gloss: how can a small bird (a sparrow, a petty person) understand the aspirations of a great bird (a phoenix), only a hero can understand a hero
to hit the mark, to hit the nail on the head

k_ele.e: 燕雀安んぞ鴻鵠の志を知らんや

r_ele.r: えんじゃくいずくんぞこうこくのこころざしをしらんや

sense.gloss: only a hero can understand a hero, swallows and sparrows can't understand the aspirations of phoenixes and swans

words.gloss: how can a small bird (a sparrow, a petty person) understand the aspirations of a great bird (a phoenix), only a hero can understand a hero
